abstract: Lyons Square Playground in South Bronx is among 35 parks in low-income areas that will receive makeover under Mayor Bill de Blasio's Community Parks Initiative; plan submitted by designer Alison Shipley adds garden walk and emphasizes fitness, but must undergo lengthy approval process before likely completion in 2017.
lead_paragraph: A plan for Lyons Square Playground, one of the 35 parks singled out for renovations by the city’s Community Parks Initiative, includes a revamped water park and a 300-foot garden walk.

headline.main: Adding Spaces for Fun and Fitness to a Neglected Park in the South Bronx
